substreams.name: veOCEAN
substreams.description: Earn by locking OCEAN into veOCEAN Earn by locking OCEAN into veOCEAN

substreams.name: Volume DF
substreams.description: Earn by allocating veOCEAN to high-DCV assets; or delegating veOCEAN to others.

substreams.name: Predictoor
substreams.description: Earn by doing Predictoor actions (submit predictions every 5 min and stake OCEAN with that); or delegating OCEAN (not veOCEAN) to Predictoors.

substreams.name: Challenge
substreams.description: Earn by doing Contestant actions (submit predictions once a week to the Predict-ETH Data Challenge).
